General.Name: Educomp Solutions Limited
General.Description: Educomp Solutions Limited provides education support services in India. The company operates through Higher Learning Solutions, School Learning Solutions, K-12 Schools, and Online, Supplemental, and Global Business segments. It offers vocational, higher education, and professional development services, as well as smart class services, preschools and high schools; and internet based educational services and coaching services. The company was incorporated in 1994 and is based in New Delhi, India.
